website_summaries.verdict: Nicely priced USB lighter that allows for up to 150 uses on each full charge, in a stylish flip-top design.
pros: Provides nice battery performance versus other flip-top-style USB lighters
Has an indicator light to alert you when the battery charge is low
Flip-top lid design should help protect children from accidental burns
cons: Arc doesn't extend far from the lighter, so it can be tough to light a pipe or other large surface areas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for windy days!!
customer_reviews.text: Received order promptly and it was packed very well. The lighter itself is very light and compact. It works extremely well especially in New England where we have our fair share of strong winds!! It comes within it's own durable box with the charging cord. I suggest charging completely before first use. Have used for a little over a week. Haven't had to recharge it yet. Nice strong arc and well worth it for the minimal price. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Henner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/Broken
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until I had to charge it. Item came fully charged. Charge held for a while (Couple months, light to moderate use). Went to recharge it and to my surprise, the micro usb connector was dislodged. Opened the item up and the piece just fell off. Must have shipped broken. Unable to charge. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after very few lights.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I got about 25 lights before it stopped working and signaled it needed to be recharged. Thought it might not of been fully charged upon receipt. Recharged it and only got 10-12 lights before it went dead again and indicated it needed recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pink

customer_reviews.title: Nice lighter worked great for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Worked great,but now only has one stream instead of two so it's very hard to light a cigarette or light anything for that matter I believe there was supposed to be a warranty with this but not sure who to contact or how about going in to get it replaced or fixed .

customer_reviews.title: Works for certain uses
customer_reviews.text: Pros, no fire, works good for certain uses. Cons, the battery doesn’t last very long, and the lid doesn’t open enough to fit this inside the bowl of many pipes. Eh it’s an okay lighter if you’re not going to use it for a semi deep pipe.

customer_reviews.title: Best lighter ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lighter ever. My joints are damaged and trying to use a regular lighter is impossible. I love candles but I rarely used them before because I always had to get somebody else to light them for me. This lighter is freedom. All you do is press the button on the side and it lights. I used to use a long grill-style lighter and this is way easier than having to press down the handle. It comes with the charging cord so I just plug it into my laptop whenever it gets low. I love this lighter so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dearnys

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok lighter
customer_reviews.text: I used the lighter to light my candles. It did take a little bit to get them lit. However, not worrying about the flame coming back on my hand was the best part....haha If you are using it to light cigarettes it would work great especially if you are outside and it's windy. I haven't had the chance to re-charge it because I just didn't use it that much. I do like the idea of a rechargeable lighter and I think in the end it would save money instead of buying more lighters or solution to fill them up.

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter
customer_reviews.text: the lighter arrived in an nicely designed package with foam around the lighter itself and an included short micro USB cable. This lighter feels sold and has a shiny gunmetal finish. I would have preferred a matte, rubbery finish so that is was not slippery and doesn't show fingerprints but it is attractive looking and weighty.
